pursuant
to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. ☐

Item 5.03 Amendments to Articles of
Incorporation or Bylaws; Change
in Fiscal Year.

On December 1, 2021, Capital One Financial
Corporation (the “Company”)
filed a Certificate of Elimination to its
Restated Certificate of Incorporation with the
Secretary of State of the State of Delaware
eliminating
from the Restated Certificate of Incorporation
all matters set forth in the Certificate of
Designations with respect to its Fixed Rate
Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock,
Series G (the “Series G Preferred Stock”) and
a Certificate of Elimination to its
Restated Certificate of Incorporation with the
Secretary of State of the State of Delaware
eliminating from the Restated Certificate of
Incorporation all matters set forth in the
Certificate of Designations with respect to
its Fixed Rate Non-Cumulative Perpetual
Preferred
Stock, Series H (the “Series H Preferred
Stock”).

All outstanding shares of the Series G
Preferred Stock and the Series
H Preferred Stock were redeemed on December 1,
2021. Copies of the Certificate of Elimination
relating to the Series G Preferred Stock
and the Certificate of Elimination relating to
the Series H Preferred Stock are attached as
Exhibit 3.1 and Exhibit 3.2, respectively,
to this Current Report on Form 8-K and are
incorporated herein by reference.
